Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.debug

Class Debugger

java.lang.Object
com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.debug.Debugger
All Implemented Interfaces:
StatisticsObserver
public class Debugger
extends java.lang.Object
implements StatisticsObserver
The Debugger is used to gather and show in game debug information.
